name: Keyboard Escape
description:
Submission for GMTK Game Jam 2020. Theme: Out of Control

In Keyboard Escape  you must help the protagonist, Brian, escape out of the controls, i.e. your keyboard. Hold down keys to guide Brian along a route to an exit, which is hidden somewhere in the keyboard. But watch out, not every key is safe!

Music by Frankum & Frankumjay; Wrapped In Dreams, used under the Attribution Noncommercial License
